structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: The planning commission of each unit shall prepare a comprehensive plan, which shall serve as a guide for public and private actions and decisions to assure the development of public and private property in the most appropriate relationships. The elements of the plan may be expressed in words, graphics, or other appropriate forms. They shall be interrelated, and each element shall describe how it relates to each of the other elements.
law.history: Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 172, sec. 24.
